game.title: The Forbidden Temple Quest
game.objective: Retrieve the Amulet of Ancency from the ancient temple.
game.description: A perilous quest awaits you: uncover the secrets of an abandoned temple and obtain the mystical Amulet. Many have tried, but few have returned unscathed.
game.reward: Upon success, the Amulet grants you riches and a high level boost.

task.objective: Detect the temple's location in the ancient scrolls.
task.description: Locate the hidden entrance within the Library of Elders, where the scrolls hold the clues to the temple's whereabouts.

task.objective: Overcome the guardian beast in the forest.
task.description: Clear the path by defeating the fierce creature guarding the entrance. It's said to be a powerful draconic wyrm.

task.objective: Enter and navigate the temple's traps.
task.description: Beware the traps that guard the chambers, and uncover their secrets to reach the hidden chamber.

task.objective: Seize the Amulet from the inner sanctum.
task.description: The Amulet lies at the heart of the temple; defeat the guardian and claim your prize.

task.objective: Return the Amulet to the archaeologist.
task.description: Deliver the Amulet back to its rightful owner for a well-deserved reward.
